item.title: BSE Ltd Sees Heavy Put Option Activity Amid Bullish Price Momentum
item.description: BSE Ltd, a key player in the Capital Markets sector, has witnessed significant put option trading activity ahead of the 27 January 2026 expiry, signalling increased bearish positioning and hedging among investors. Time: 59 minutes ago

item.title: Arvee Laboratories Surges to Upper Circuit Amid Strong Buying Pressure

Time: 59 minutes ago

item.title: Shakti Pumps Surges on Heavy Value Trading Amid Institutional Interest

item.title: Hitachi Energy India Sees Sharp Open Interest Surge Amid Bearish Price Action
